EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Billy, I just entered to follow up on this email. Would you still like to schedule a tour of the MBO account? If so please schedule another time <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFJWu0Nzy%2FGbLbnsjSHOf4q79b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> for us to talk. Thanks Billy!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Friday, January 25, 2013 6:26 PM To: billy.daquino@gmail.com Cc: Sara Conde Subject: FW: Your MBO account is now active Hi Billy, My name is Nicolette and I am backing up Sara while she is out of the office. You do not need to wait to enter your hours until Sara is back in the office and if you need any assistance I will be happy to speak with you and walk you through the system. If we could follow up on Monday I will take a look in the system and see what the issue is around changing your W4 elections to be accurate to your filing status, but you should be able to go to “Payroll” in the business center and then click on “Withholding” on the left hand side of the page and make the changes there. If you have already been there and it is not allowing you to make the change or save the change please let me know and I will look into it. Have a great weekend!Nicolette From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, January 25, 2013 10:01 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: FW: Your MBO account is now active From: Billy D'Aquino Sent: Friday, January 25, 2013 10:00:34 AM (UTC-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada) To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Your MBO account is now activeGood morning Sara. I looked at your calendar this morning to schedule some time to review the Business Center portal. It shows your next available date is not until the first week of Feb. Will I need the review before submitting my first week of billable time? I've already started logging my hours and mileage for this week. I did have one question regarding the withholding information for in-state calculations. The state shows California but I can't seem to change the "State Filing Status" from "Single" to "Married". Will this be an issue? Thanks, Billy
On Jan 18, 2013, at 10:05 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Billy, Welcome to MBO Partners! Here are some important reminders to be aware of: - Here are some time and expense entry instructions <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_Time_and_Expense_Entry_Instructions.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFJWu0Nzy%2FGbLbnsjSHOf4q79b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> for using our system. - Here is a copy of our expense policy <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFJWu0Nzy%2FGbLbnsjSHOf4q79b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - Here is a list of the most common expenses <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_List.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFJWu0Nzy%2FGbLbnsjSHOf4q79b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> you can submit to MBO. - All the benefits of MBO Partners Referral Program <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/referral-program?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFJWu0Nzy%2FGbLbnsjSHOf4q79b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. The next step is to schedule another time <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFJWu0Nzy%2FGbLbnsjSHOf4q79b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> that works for you so we can do a walk-through of the business center and I can show you all the great features. I look forward to working with you! Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFJWu0Nzy%2FGbLbnsjSHOf4q79b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFJWu0Nzy%2FGbLbnsjSHOf4q79b9yBJ2MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
